Text:
I am very tempted to download your excellent work, but before I could I have one question: Will you be producing a FLAC version ?

Thanks.

If you would like, I can. I have an excellent audio converter.

But that's going to be a huge size! Probably about 15-18 GBs, so if I were to upload it, then I'd need a lot of help from you or whoever else could at least leech it. My maximum upload speed is only 120 kbps. I'll deal with this torrent, and in 2-3 weeks, I promise you I;ll upload FLAC. :)

Kirill539, thanks for the quick response. I would very much appreciate a FLAC upload. I will give you as much help as I can (my upload is around 80 kbps - but I can upload 24/7, so not a problem - anyone else out there want to help out?).

With respect to the size, again I am used to downloads that size and happy to download over a period of time.

Thanks again..

The torrent is already up. 
Just please become a permanent seeder once you complete it. :). Enjoy.
Current actual ratio: 14 seeds and 27 peers.

Thanks, just took what I needed to complete my discography, and the extras were a fun bonus!
=]
Cheers man, great job on the compilation! Awesome quality, nice that it's VBR.
awesome set of things in the torrent thanx now i just cant wait till vnv nations new cd hits on sept 16th woot 2 more days!!!!!!
